modName: Tifa Outfit-black advent children cloth by Himmelsky
summary: This orignaloutfit of Tifa is from the film or game Final Fantasy VII. I made it just by myself. After more than 10 years, tifa come back. Maybe today not all the pepole know her, but she is always the goddess in my heart.
descriptionHtml:
Foreword: After more than 10 years, Tifa Lockhar come back. Maybe today not all the pepole know her, but she is always the goddess in my heart.

I made this orignaloutfit of Tifa with reference to the CG Photo and the Screenshot of the film. The Tools are 3DMAX2012, Zbrush, Nifkope, Photoshop, and Xnormal, because i am not satisfied with the textures of the last outfit of Tifa, so this time, i made the textures much more seriously, and i hope you guys can enjoy with it. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mod Name: Tifa Outfit-black advent children cloth by Himmelsky
Made By: Himmelsky (dragon717)
Version: V1
Support Body for： UNP (CBBE can also use it, but the face maybe looks a little bright)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
1. Download the file from Nexus
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Activates the selected mod\" button.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to get:
1. you can use the ID of the Items from the Console:
Boots: XX000D62
Cuirass: XX000D63
Gauntlets: XX000D64
2. you can also temper the Items under the Part of Glass Amrors.
author: Himmelsky
